actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the mandatory allocation and pricing of coal in the event of a national disruption in coal production caused by a labor dispute.

summary.text: Provides for the mandatory allocation and pricing of coal in the event of a national disruption in coal production caused by a labor dispute. Provides that coal shall be allocated pursuant to this Act in accordance with the following priorities: (1) the protection of the national health, safety, welfare, and defense; (2) the maintenance of public services and institutions, however owned; and (3) the maintenance of power plants. Specifies priorities with respect to sources from which the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall obtain coal for allocation under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the mandatory allocation and pricing of coal in the event of a national disruption in coal production caused by a labor dispute.
